english name: The Key to Fluffiness Is the Mixing Method!
japanese name: ふんわり感は混ぜかたにあり！
skill name (english): A Gentle Support, a Hidden Flavor
skill effect (japanese): 5秒間 スコアが100%UPする 自身を除き「Vivid BAD SQUAD」メンバーを1人編成する毎にスコアが10%UPし、全員一致で更に10%UPする（最大150%)
skill effect (english): 100% score boost for 5 seconds. Gain additional +10% boost for every [Vivid BAD SQUAD] card (except for themselves), and another +10% boost if all cards are from the same unit (up to 150%).
gacha phrase: そうやってツノが立つまで泡立てるんだ
